kariminf.langpi.basic

Interface Normalizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArNormalizer, BgNormalizer, CaNormalizer, CsNormalizer, DefNormalizer, DeNormalizer, ElNormalizer, EnNormalizer, EsNormalizer, EuNormalizer, FaNormalizer, FiNormalizer, FrNormalizer, HeNormalizer, HiNormalizer, HuNormalizer, IdNormalizer, ItNormalizer, JaNormalizer, KoNormalizer, NlNormalizer, NnNormalizer, NoNormalizer, PtNormalizer, RoNormalizer, RuNormalizer, SvNormalizer, ThNormalizer, TrNormalizer, ZhNormalizer

    public interface Normalizer
    This interface is used for text Normalization To normalize a text is to replace or delete some characters, For example, in Arabic we delete diacritics (Tashkiil), in French we replace diacritics (énervé --> enerve)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()
      Gives the type (function) of normalization with its description.
      java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String text)
      Normalizes a text.
      java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String param)
      Normalizes a text, given a parameter Sometimes there are many types of normalization, and using this method one can choose which normalization function to use

    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String text)
        Normalizes a text. Here, all types of normalization are used for a given language.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be normalized
        Returns:
        a normalized text

      • normalize

        java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String text,
                           java.lang.String param)
        Normalizes a text, given a parameter Sometimes there are many types of normalization, and using this method one can choose which normalization function to use
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be normalized
        param - the function we want to apply on the text
        Returns:
        a normalized text

      • getParameters

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Gives the type (function) of normalization with its description.
        Returns:
        name of each parameter with its description
